issues.description: Solution repository classes are named SpaceSeal, SpacePig, and SpaceGoat, whereas the problem statement and template expect classes named Seal, Pig, and Goat. This naming mismatch will prevent students from instantiating and using the intended classes as specified in the exercise.
issues.suggested_fix: Either rename the solution classes to Seal, Pig, and Goat (removing the “Space” prefix) so they match the class names expected by the problem and template, or update the problem statement and template to consistently refer to SpaceSeal, SpacePig, and SpaceGoat.

issues.description: The problem statement and template expect classes named Seal, Pig, and Goat, but the solution repository defines these as SpaceSeal, SpacePig, and SpaceGoat. This mismatch forces students to map between different class names for the same concepts, creating unnecessary confusion.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename the solution classes from SpaceSeal, SpacePig, and SpaceGoat to Seal, Pig, and Goat (or update the problem and template to use the Space-prefixed names) to ensure consistent class naming across all artifacts.
